attributes.action: Stop Gary Neville on Sky Sports
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition if you wish to remove Gary Neville from his commenting on any football related TV show.  Over the years he has proven countless times from his on and off pitch behaviour that he's not a role model and should not be in the position he's in.

The govt should take drastic action in removing him from the spot light of live football and place someone more respectable in his place.
